outputs.output_descr: The "Promoting Autonomous Adaptation at the community level in Ethiopia project" will contribute to Ethiopia's NAPA priorities (Promoting drought/crop insurance programme in Ethiopia; Strengthening/enhancing drought and flood early warning systems in Ethiopia; Developing small-scale irrigation and water harvesting schemes in arid, semi-arid, and dry sub-humid areas of Ethiopia; Establishing community-based sustainable utilization and management of wetlands in selected parts of Ethiopia; Promoting of farm and homestead forestry and agro-forestry practices in arid, semi-arid and dry-sub humid parts of Ethiopia) and is aligned to the nation's growth and transformation plan. It will support the National Climate Resilient Green Growth Strategy, by supporting the development of territorial climate resilient plans at sub-national level and supporting the application of climate risk reducing techniques and practices in selected rural and urban sites.

project_descr: LDCF/ Promoting Authonomous Adaptation at the local community level in Ethiopia.
project_title: Promoting Autonomus Adaptation at Community Level-ETH
